mapper.select:
select
from block order by time desc

select
from block order by time desc limit 10

mapper.update:
update block
blockchain_id = #{blockchainId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
height = #{height,jdbcType=INTEGER},
time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
tx_size = #{txSize,jdbcType=INTEGER},
size_on_disk = #{sizeOnDisk,jdbcType=BIGINT},
difficulty = #{difficulty,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
prev_blockhash = #{prevBlockhash,jdbcType=CHAR},
next_blockhash = #{nextBlockhash,jdbcType=CHAR},
output_total = #{outputTotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
transaction_fees = #{transactionFees,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
merkle_root = #{merkleRoot,jdbcType=CHAR},
where blockhash = #{blockhash,jdbcType=CHAR}

update block set blockchain_id = #{blockchainId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, height = #{height,jdbcType=INTEGER}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tx_size = #{txSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, size_on_disk = #{sizeOnDisk,jdbcType=BIGINT}, difficulty = #{difficulty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, prev_blockhash = #{prevBlockhash,jdbcType=CHAR}, next_blockhash = #{nextBlockhash,jdbcType=CHAR}, output_total = #{outputTotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, transaction_fees = #{transactionFees,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, merkle_root = #{merkleRoot,jdbcType=CHAR} where blockhash = #{blockhash,jdbcType=CHAR}
